about.title: Welcome to The Reservoire Koramangala: Where Every Sip Tells a Story

about.paragraph2: Step into The Reservoire Koramangala and embark on a sensory journey. Our expert mixologists are constantly innovating, crafting a curated collection of artisanal cocktails that range from timeless classics to our unique, imaginative creations. Beyond the exquisite drinks, our lively ambiance, often punctuated by exciting events and captivating music, ensures that every visit is a truly immersive experience.
